tasks.label: C/C++: make build (nearest project)
args: project="${fileDirname}"; workspace="${workspaceFolder}"; while [ "$project" != "$workspace" ] && [ ! -f "$project/Makefile" ]; do project="$(dirname "$project")"; done; if [ ! -f "$project/Makefile" ]; then echo "No Makefile found from ${fileDirname} up to ${workspaceFolder}" >&2; exit 1; fi; make -C "$project" FILE="${file}"
tasks.detail: Builds the nearest subproject containing a Makefile.

tasks.label: C/C++: make run (nearest project)
args: project="${fileDirname}"; workspace="${workspaceFolder}"; while [ "$project" != "$workspace" ] && [ ! -f "$project/Makefile" ]; do project="$(dirname "$project")"; done; if [ ! -f "$project/Makefile" ]; then echo "No Makefile found from ${fileDirname} up to ${workspaceFolder}" >&2; exit 1; fi; make -C "$project" run FILE="${file}"
tasks.detail: Runs the nearest subproject containing a Makefile.
